text: It Started with a Kiss is a 1959 American romantic comedy movie directed by George Marshall and starring Glenn Ford, Debbie Reynolds, Eva Gabor, Gustavo Rojo, Fred Clark, Edgar Buchanan, Harry Morgan, Robert Warwick, Frances Bavier. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Marshall
title: It Started with a Kiss (movie)
